name: Aim Rhythm
description:
Have you ever wanted to become an aiming god? Laugh over your friends while you tea-bag them effortlessly destroying them in every shooter game you ever play?

LOOK NO FURTHER. Aim Rhythm is a game that lets you train your aiming to perfection with your favorite music. Get used to different tempos and aiming techniques such as flicking and tracking, all while listening to your favorite songs and beats!

We support any music file in mp3 formats and we also support osu file formats, which we have custom built to ensure they work perfectly for first and third person shooters.

Gone are the days where you lose firefights. Perfect your aim with the power of music!
